ur_rna.StructureEditor.menus

Class MainMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.AbstractButton
            • javax.swing.JMenuItem
              • javax.swing.JMenu
                • ur_rna.Utilities.swing.MergeMenu
                  • ur_rna.StructureEditor.menus.MainMenu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.ItemSelectable, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.MenuElement, javax.swing.SwingConstants, IMenuItem, IMergeItem
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FileMenu, SettingsMenu, WindowsMenu

    public class MainMenu
extends MergeMenu
    A MainMenu is essentially an MergeMenu that is designed to be subclassed and to handle the actions of its child menu items by attaching itself as an ActionListener to all child menu items.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • MainMenu

        public MainMenu(java.lang.String title)
        The ActionLister that will be used to delegate ActionEvents produced by the menu items. The default is null, which indicates that menu events are handled internally (i.e. in a sub-class)
